DMCA NOTICE
Up-Statistics Corp. 
 
8957 Wheatland Ave. 
 
Sun Valley, CA 91352 
 
www.brilliantexchange.com 
 
www.mlmbrilliance.com 
 
October 31, 2006
818 351-0404 
 
  
 
  
 
Re:       http://www.biz4you.net/us.htm  
 
            http://www.biz4you.net/us.htm#audio 
 
  
 
                         
 
  
 
To:        ThePlanet.com Internet Services Inc 
 
            Attn:  Abuse  
 
            1333 North Stemmons Freeway 
 
            Suite 100 
 
            Dallas, TX  75207 
 
            abuse@theplanet.com 
 
  
 
  
 
  
 
  
 
To Whom it May Concern:                       
 
  
 
            Up-Statistics Corporation is the owner of U.S. Trademark
Registration No. 2,324,435 for the mark BRILLIANT COMPENSATION. 
Additionally, Up-Statistics Corporation and its related company,
Brilliant Exchange, Inc. are the producers of a number of
copyright-protected  video 
works, one of which is a CD audio work entitled "Brilliant
Compensation."   
 
  
 
It has come to our attention that our "Brilliant Compensation" audio
file has been copied and is streaming from,
http://www.biz4you.net/us.htm and http://www.biz4you.net/us.htm#audio,
(70.86.181.66) which is a website you host.  
 
  
 
            The use of our copyrighted work and our trademark is without

authority from us and violates our intellectual property rights. 
Up-Statistics has a good faith belief that use of the material in the
manner 
complained of is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agents, or
the 
law. 
 
  
 
            Please take appropriate action to disable access to the 
infringing materials described below, in accordance with the provisions
of 
the Digital Millenium Copyright Act or 1998.  
 
  
 
Infringed Work or Right: "Brilliant Compensation" audio   
 
  
 
Original Materails and Copyright Holder: Up-Statistics Corporation  
 
  
 
Location of Original Works:  
 
The "Brilliant Compensation" CD can be purchased at 
http://www.brilliantexchange.com/product1.aspx?Product_ID=70 
<http://www.brilliantexchange.com/product1.aspx?Product_ID=70&Category_I
D=2> 
&Category_ID=2  
 
  
 
  
 
URL of Infringed Works or Right: 
 
http://www.biz4you.net/us.htm  
 
http://www.biz4you.net/us.htm#audio 
 
  
 
You will find a clickable audio button to listen to the audio in the
middle 
of the page, under an image Dr. Charles King. Look for the section
headline 
"Listen to Audio presentations about this exciting business"    
 
  
 
You will also find a link to the same audio at the bottom of the page,
in 
the menu section. The link says "Listen to Audio" and redirects to 
http://www.biz4you.net/us.htm#audio  
 
  
 
  
 
            I certify that the information contained in this notice is 
accurate and complete, under penalty of perjury as the duly appointed 
contact person on behalf of the copyright owner.  Should you requrie
further 
information regarding this matter please feel free to call on me. I may
be 
contacted at:  
 
  
 
Name:               Sue Hatfield 
 
Title:                 President 
 
Company:         Up-Statistics Corporation  
 
Street Address: 8957 Wheatland Ave. 
 
City and State:  Sun Valley, California 
 
Country:            U.S.A. 
 
Zip Code:          91352 
 
Email:               sue@brilliantexchange.com  
 
Phone:              (818) 351-0404 
 
  
 
Please note that a hard copy of this letter has been sent via the mail.

 
  
 
Thank you, and I expect that you will remove our stolen material
immediately 
in accordance with the provisions of the Digital Millienium Copyright
Act of 
1998. 
 
  
 
  
 
  
 
   
 
Very truly yours, 
 
Text Box:  
 
  
 
 
                                                             
 
  
 
  
 
Susan Hatfield 
 
President 
 
sue@brilliantexchange.com
